scripts.postinstall: find src -iname *.ts | sed -e 's/ts$/js/g' -e 's/src/test/' | xargs -d \\n mkjson -m makefile.json5
scripts.all: find test -iname \*.js | xargs -d \\n -I {} bash -c 'node run-test.mjs {}' ; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "\e[32m✓\e[0m All tests passed"; else echo "\e[31m✕\e[0m Some tests failed"; fi
